main event: A UFO sighting occurred on February 5, 1951, in Lucerne Valley, California, involving unidentified objects observed in the sky.
interesting points: The sighting was initially reported by civilian observers,The objects were described as silvery and brighter than a white cloud,The sighting lasted for approximately two to three minutes,Observers reported seeing two initial objects, with a third sighted later,The weather conditions were calm with clear visibility at the time of the sighting.
witness description: Civilians including Mr. from Lucerne Valley and additional witnesses driving from Hesperia.
